links.linkLabel: PMI Chapter of the Year Awards Program

description: The PMI Awards celebrate the contributions of exceptional project leaders all over the world. Learn about the people making the world better and brighter, one project at a time.

images.imageCaption: PMI Professional Awards honors the people, PMOs, and project achievements that are making an impact in cutting edge industries around the world.
The PMI Research & Academic Awards recognizes individuals and published works that are significantly advancing practical and theoretical practices of project management.

images.captionTitle: PMI Chapter of the Year Awards Program
images.imageCaption: The PMI Chapter of the Year Awards program recognizes and honors those chapters that have made significant contributions to members, the project management profession, and Project Management Institute, gathers best practices to share, and allows chapters to reflect and record their achievements for the past year.

The PMI Educational Foundation (PMIEF) Kerzner Award for Excellence in Project Management honors individuals who demonstrate dedication, original concepts, and leadership in project management for social good.
